```{r}
#Load Packages
library( dplyr )
```

```{r}

#Load Data
firepolice <- read.csv( "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/christine-brown/SyracuseLandBank/master/DATA/PROCESSED_DATA/firepolice_processed.csv", stringsAsFactors=FALSE )
firepolice_tract <- as.data.frame( table( firepolice$GEOID10 ) )

names( firepolice_tract ) <- c( "GEOID10", "FIREPOLICE2017" )

#Export to CSV
write.csv( firepolice_tract, file = "firepolice_final.csv", row.names=FALSE )
```
